reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: The Global Fund Supported Project on HIV/AIDS in Vietnam

description.narrative: Viet Nam - HIV - Viet Nam Union of Science and Technology Associations - LHH Vietnam. This program has the following goals: Contribute to the National HIV/AIDS Strategy's goal of controlling the HIV prevalence in communities below 0.3%, reducing the morbidity and mortality due to HIV infection, reducing the impact of HIV/AIDS on socio-economic growth.. Strengthen participation of civil society organizations and community based organizations in contribution to national HIV/AIDS response.. The objectives of this program are: To sustain and promote essential package of combination prevention interventions, focusing on key populations and sexual partners of PLHIV in community.. To expand and promote early diagnosis through HIV testing using mixed traditional and innovative approaches for key populations & sexual partners of PLHIV in community.. To sustain and improve access to ART to maximize preventive and therapeutic benefits of ART on HIV transmission and reducing AIDS deaths, and contribute to the national target of 90% of people diagnosed are receiving ART, and 90% of people receiving ART have their viral load suppressed, while ensuring smooth transition to domestic financed program by social health insurance.. To strengthen sustainable system to generate strategic information to guide effective and efficient response to HIV/AIDS.. To strengthen community systems for effective and sustainable response to HIV/AIDS.. To promote enabling environment for key populations and PLHIV in access to health and legal services.

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for VNM-H-VUSTA
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of transgender people reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Impact indicator for VNM-H-VUSTA
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
Percentage of people living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for VNM-H-VUSTA
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
